sys_remote_update_set.description:
We have discovered that most of the time when a virtual desktop is being decommissioned the user is no longer in Service Now. Managers are entering their own name and their managers (often VPs) are getting swamped with requests.
If the user doesn't exist they can check the box and fill out the name and "I" number. This type of request shouldn't go to their manager either.
sys_remote_update_set.name: JL - 2017-03-20 - STRY0014974 - VDI Decom user variable
